pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry Prometheus Remote Write Exporter==============================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-exporter-prometheus-remote-write.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-exporter-prometheus-remote-write/This package contains an exporter to send metrics from the OpenTelemetry Python SDK directly to a Prometheus Remote Write integrated backend(such as Cortex or Thanos) without having to run an instance of the Prometheus server.Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-exporter-prometheus-remote-write.. _OpenTelemetry: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python/.. _Prometheus Remote Write integrated backend: https://prometheus.io/docs/operating/integrations/References----------* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_* `Prometheus Remote Write Integration <https://prometheus.io/docs/operating/integrations/>`_
